org.jogger.config
Class Interceptors

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.config.Interceptors

public abstract class Interceptors
extends Object

This is the mechanism that web applications use for registering interceptors. Just subclass this abstract class and call the add(Interceptor, String...) method to add interceptors.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Detail

add

public Interceptors add(Interceptor interceptor,
                        String... paths)
Stores a new Interceptor implementation with the specified paths.

Parameters:
interceptor - the interceptor to be added.
paths - the paths for which this interceptor will be executed.
Returns:
this instance for method chaining.

Returns:

initialize

public abstract void initialize(javax.servlet.ServletConfig servletConfig)
This is the method that subclasses implement to add interceptors.
